title: You can now finally delete the last 15 minutes of your Google Search history on Android
content:
Last year at Google I/O, Google announced that the ability to delete your last 15 minutes of search history would be coming to mobile. It began to roll out on iOS shortly after, but the feature was noticeably absent on Android. The company said it would be coming to the platform later on in the

The post You can now finally delete the last 15 minutes of your Google Search history on Android appeared first on xda-developers.
description: You can now finally delete the last 15 minutes of your search history on Android, over a year after the feature debuted on iOS. Check it out.
